title:
The dynamics of the focusing NLH with a potential beyond the mass-energy
  threshold
authors: Shuang Ji, Jing Lu, and Fanfei Meng
abstract:
We study the dynamics of the focusing nonlinear Hartree equation with a Kato
potential $$ i\partial_t u +\Delta u - Vu = -(|\cdot|^{-\gamma} \ast |u|^2)u,
\quad x \in \mathbb{R}^d $$ under some assumptions on the potential $V$. We
prove the blow up versus global existence dichotomy for solutions beyond the
threshold, based on the method from Duyckaerts-Roudenko [6].
  Furthermore, our result compensates for the one of in [13] below that
threshold.
